text: David Richardson (December 24, 1955 â€“ January 18, 2021) was an American television writer and producer. He wrote for The Simpsons, Malcolm in the Middle, Two and a Half Men, and F Is for Family. Richardson died of heart failure on January 18, 2021 at the age of 65. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1955 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:American television producers Category:American television writers
